actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
			t."carId",
			c."name",
			t.model,
			lpad((t."time" / 60000)::text, 2, '0') || ':' || ((t."time" / 1000) % 60)::text || ':' || lpad((t."time" % 1000)::text, 3, '0') AS formatted_time,
			lpad((t."section1Time" / 60000)::text, 2, '0') || ':' || ((t."section1Time" / 1000) % 60)::text || ':' || lpad((t."section1Time" % 1000)::text, 3, '0')
			AS section1Time_formatted,
			lpad((t."section2Time" / 60000)::text, 2, '0') || ':' || ((t."section2Time" / 1000) % 60)::text || ':' || lpad((t."section2Time" % 1000)::text, 3, '0')
			AS section2Time_formatted,
			lpad((t."section3Time" / 60000)::text, 2, '0') || ':' || ((t."section3Time" / 1000) % 60)::text || ':' || lpad((t."section3Time" % 1000)::text, 3, '0')
			AS section3Time_formatted,
			lpad((t."section4Time" / 60000)::text, 2, '0') || ':' || ((t."section4Time" / 1000) % 60)::text || ':' || lpad((t."section4Time" % 1000)::text, 3, '0')
			AS section4Time_formatted,
			lpad((t."section5Time" / 60000)::text, 2, '0') || ':' || ((t."section5Time" / 1000) % 60)::text || ':' || lpad((t."section5Time" % 1000)::text, 3, '0')
			AS section5Time_formatted,
			lpad((t."section6Time" / 60000)::text, 2, '0') || ':' || ((t."section6Time" / 1000) % 60)::text || ':' || lpad((t."section6Time" % 1000)::text, 3, '0')
			AS section6Time_formatted,
			lpad((t."section7Time" / 60000)::text, 2, '0') || ':' || ((t."section7Time" / 1000) % 60)::text || ':' || lpad((t."section7Time" % 1000)::text, 3, '0')
			AS section7Time_formatted,
   	  CASE
         WHEN t."tunePower" = 10 AND t."tuneHandling" = 24 THEN '600HP/HG'::text
         WHEN t."tunePower" = 11 AND t."tuneHandling" = 23 THEN '620HP/HG'::text
         WHEN t."tunePower" = 12 AND t."tuneHandling" = 22 THEN '640HP/HG'::text
         WHEN t."tunePower" = 13 AND t."tuneHandling" = 21 THEN '660HP/G'::text
         WHEN t."tunePower" = 14 AND t."tuneHandling" = 20 THEN '680HP/G'::text
         WHEN t."tunePower" = 15 AND t."tuneHandling" = 19 THEN '700HP/G'::text
         WHEN t."tunePower" = 16 AND t."tuneHandling" = 18 THEN '720HP/B'::text
         WHEN t."tunePower" = 17 AND t."tuneHandling" = 17 THEN '740HP/B'::text
         WHEN t."tunePower" = 18 AND t."tuneHandling" = 16 THEN '760HP/B'::text
         WHEN t."tunePower" = 19 AND t."tuneHandling" = 15 THEN '780HP/D'::text
         WHEN t."tunePower" = 20 AND t."tuneHandling" = 14 THEN '800HP/D'::text
         WHEN t."tunePower" = 21 AND t."tuneHandling" = 13 THEN '815HP/D'::text
         WHEN t."tunePower" = 22 AND t."tuneHandling" = 12 THEN '830HP/DG'::text
         WHEN t."tunePower" = 23 AND t."tuneHandling" = 11 THEN '835HP/DG'::text
         WHEN t."tunePower" = 24 AND t."tuneHandling" = 10 THEN '840HP/DG'::text
         ELSE '未满改装车辆'::text
  	  END AS car_tune
	FROM 
			public."TimeAttackRecord" AS t
			JOIN public."Car" AS c ON t."carId" = c."carId"
	WHERE
			t."carId" = {{TableList.selectedRow.carId}} AND t.course = {{SelectTrack.selectedOptionValue}};
	SELECT pg_sleep(3);
